org.llrp.ltk.types

Class SignedShortArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.llrp.ltk.types.LLRPType
      • org.llrp.ltk.types.SignedShortArray

  • public class SignedShortArray
extends LLRPType
    Array of 16 bit signed shorts - length encoded in first 16 bits of binary encoding
